fields.bio: Bangladeshi national poet and revolutionary writer
Prominent Bangladeshi poet, novelist, and playwright
Pioneering Bangladeshi feminist writer and social reformer

fields.title: Bidrohi
fields.description: A revolutionary poem by Kazi Nazrul Islam, symbolizing rebellion against oppression.

fields.title: Banalata Sen
fields.description: One of the most famous poems by Jibananda Das, depicting the eternal beauty of a woman named Banalata Sen.

fields.title: Payer Awaj Pawa Jay
fields.description: A powerful play that reflects the socio-political issues of Bangladesh, written by Syed Shamsul Haque.

fields.title: Sultana's Dream
fields.description: A feminist utopian novella, envisioning a world where women rule and men are confined, written by Begum Rokeya.

fields.title: Shadhinota Tumi
fields.description: A patriotic poem collection by Shamsur Rahman, celebrating Bangladesh's independence and struggles.

fields.title: Nondito Noroke
fields.description: Humayun Ahmed's debut novel, exploring the complexities of human relationships in a middle-class family.
